DOCNAME: CASE OF CEVDET AND HATİCE YILMAZ v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants live in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG and Highways expropriated plots of land belonging to the applicants . A committee of experts assessed the value of the plots of land and the relevant amount was paid to the applicants when the expropriation took place .
CARDINAL . Following the ORG request for increased compensation , on DATE ORG of First - instance awarded them additional compensation plus interest at the statutory rate .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG quashed the judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of First - instance awarded the applicants additional compensation plus interest at the statutory rate .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG quashed the judgment .

CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE ORG of First - instance awarded the applicants additional compensation of MONEY ( TRL ) plus interest at the statutory rate applicable at the date of the court ’s decision , running from DATE , the date on which the title deed to the land had been transferred to ORG and Highways in the land registry .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG and Highways paid the applicants TRL CARDINAL,CARDINAL,CARDINAL,CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law and practice are set out in the ORG v. GPE ( judgment of DATE , Reports of Judgments and Decisions CARDINAL-IV ) .
